description:
This course covers how to get started with Microsoft Word 2013. Students will learn how to identify the components of the Word interface, create a basic word document and learn how to access the help system. This course is taught by Debbie Fierst.

Total Video Time: 31 minutes

Enjoyed what you saw? What to learn more about Microsoft Office Word 2013?

Check out the full Microsoft Office Word 2013 Basic Training Course
title: Word 2013 - Getting Started
